text: Madhur Milan is a 2000 Bengali film directed by Tushar Majumdar and produced by Sajjad Production. The film stars Prosenjit Chatterjee, Rituparna Sengupta, Abhishek Chatterjee, Biplab Chatterjee. The music was composed by Babul Bose. == Cast == * Prosenjit Chatterjee * Rituparna Sengupta * Abhishek Chatterjee * Biplab Chatterjee * Chinmoy Roy * Subhendu Chatterjee * Gita Dey * Soma Dey * Haradhan Banerjee * Pallavi Chatterjee == References == == External links == * * Madhur Milan at Gomolo.com Category:Indian films Category:Bengali-language films Category:2000 films Category:2000s Bengali-language films
title: Madhur Milan
